page.title: 14The Wolford Festival
page.content: During the Weekend 19-21 July, the Wolfords celebrated the 150th anniversary of the Reconsecration of the Parish Church in 1835. On Friday evening we enjoyed a concert by the Campden singers. Refreshments were served and the Church was beautifully decorated with flowers. The floral arrangements were part of a flower festival visited by many people over the weekend. Also on display were old photographs. On Saturday there were exhibitions of old farm machinery and tools, a children's farm yard and stories were told to children by H.E.Todd. In the evening a dance/barbecue was held at Nethercote. On Sunday two special church services were held, the second being a festal evensong presided over by Bishop Gibbs and attended by a visiting Choir and Organist.
